description:
Includes a FREE DOWNLOADABLE BONUS copy of Wallace D Wattles hidden treasure 'How To Promote Yourself'

Seeing the movie 'The Secret' for the first time back in 2006, I was immediately inspired to locate the book behind the move. It was called 'The Science Of Getting Rich' and even though it was written by Wallace D Wattles way back in 1910, every single page just leapt out at me as making perfectly good sense. It was like I instinctively 'Knew' that what Wallace was saying was absolutely THE TRUTH, and I haven't looked back since.

At the time of receiving my very first copy of The Science Of Getting Rich, I was living in a flat that I hated, going to a job I detested, driving a car I was embarrassed by and was incredibly sick with something called 'Graves Disease'... Now as I sit here writing this, I live in a house that I love, surrounded by fantastic neighbours, just two doors away from my parents. I have worked (And I use the term very lightly) from home since 2011 doing 'stuff' that I love. I drive a car that puts a smile on my face eveytime I start her up, and my present health is incredible... Now, Just like you, I work on this 'stuff' everyday, and have only just begun to scratch the surface of what's truly possible using the Ideas, tools and techniques in this incredible body of work called 'The Science Of Getting Rich'

I actually own quite a few copies of 'The Science Of Getting Rich' in several different formats, and I am so excited to have the opportunity to share this work with you here on Udemy. Millions of people worldwide have immersed themselves into this great mans work, and now it's your turn.

I look forward to meeting you on the beaches of the world to hear how this course changed your world and made you rich...

Love & Light

Mark Denton Bevens
title: The Science Of Getting Rich Workshop
